Name: Government Agency
Description: The Government agency type is used for any agency operated by the government. These are government units responsible for administering specific functions for a government.

Properties.Name: Date founded
Properties.Description: The date when this agency was founded.

Properties.Name: Jurisdiction of agency's government
Properties.Description: The place that the government of this agency has jurisdiction over. E.g., if it is an agency of the national government, enter the country; if it is part of a local government, enter the city or municipality.

Properties.Name: Predecessor agency
Properties.Description: If this agency was formerly known as another agency, or if this agency took on the functions of a previous agency enter that agency. Mergers and spin-offs should be entered in the appropriate properties of the Organization type.
